languages.text: "Некоторые зовут меня Защитни{mf|ком|цей} Простора, но я предпочитаю просто {name}. Приятно познакомиться, э-э-э, Я-из-другой-версии-бытия".
"Some refer to me as the Warden of the Expanse, but I prefer being addressed simply as {name}. Nice to meet you... ah... me-from-a-different-version-of-existence."
languages.original_text: "Некоторые зовут меня Защитни{mf|ком|цей} Простора, но я предпочитаю просто {name}. Приятно познакомиться, э-э-э, Я-из-другой-версии-бытия".

traits.locale_text: "Some call me Warden of the Expanse, but I prefer being addressed simply as {name}. Nice to meet you, uh, Me-from-a-different-version-of-existence."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: "Some call me Warden of the Expanse, but I prefer being addressed simply as {name}. Nice to meet you, uh, Me-from-a-different-version-of-existence."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: "Some refer to me as the Warden of the Expanse, but I prefer being addressed simply as {name}. Nice to meet you, uh, Me-from-a-different-version-of-existence."

traits.locale_text: "Some refer to me as the Warden of the Expanse, but I prefer being addressed simply as {name}. Nice to meet you... ah... me-from-a-different-version-of-existence."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: "Some refer to me as the Warden of the Expanse, but I prefer being addressed simply as {name}. Nice to meet you... ah... me-from-a-different-version-of-existence."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: « D'aucuns me considèrent comme {mf|le gardien|la gardienne} des Étendues, mais je préfère que l'on m'appelle simplement {name}. {mf|Ravi|Ravie} de rencontrer mon double d'une version différente de l'existence. »
languages.original_text: "Some refer to me as the Warden of the Expanse, but I prefer being addressed simply as {name}. Nice to meet you... ah... me-from-a-different-version-of-existence."

traits.locale_text: « D'aucuns me considèrent comme {mf|le gardien|la gardienne} des Étendues, mais je préfère que l'on m'appelle simplement {name}. {mf|Ravi|Ravie} de rencontrer mon double d'une version différente de l'existence. »
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: «Algunos me llaman Custodi{mf|o|a} de la Extensión, pero prefiero que me llamen {name}, sin más. Encantad{mf|o|a} de conocerte... yo de otra versión distinta del universo».
languages.original_text: "Some refer to me as the Warden of the Expanse, but I prefer being addressed simply as {name}. Nice to meet you... ah... me-from-a-different-version-of-existence."

traits.locale_text: «Algunos me llaman Custodi{mf|o|a} de la Extensión, pero prefiero que me llamen {name}, sin más. Encantad{mf|o|a} de conocerte... yo de otra versión distinta del universo».
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: “有的人称呼我为‘扩区的守护者’，但我更喜欢大家直接叫我{name}。很高兴见到你，呃，来自另一个世界的我。”
languages.original_text: "Some refer to me as the Warden of the Expanse, but I prefer being addressed simply as {name}. Nice to meet you... ah... me-from-a-different-version-of-existence."

traits.locale_text: “有的人称呼我为‘扩区的守护者’，但我更喜欢大家直接叫我{name}。很高兴见到你，呃，来自另一个世界的我。”
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: 「私を『エクスパンスの監視者』と呼ぶ者もいるが、単に{name}と呼んでもらいたい。はじめまして、『異存なる私』よ」
languages.original_text: "Some refer to me as the Warden of the Expanse, but I prefer being addressed simply as {name}. Nice to meet you... ah... me-from-a-different-version-of-existence."

traits.locale_text: 「私を『エクスパンスの監視者』と呼ぶ者もいるが、単に{name}と呼んでもらいたい。はじめまして、『異存なる私』よ」
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: "Manche nennen mich {mf|Hüter|Hüterin} der Ausdehnung, doch ich ziehe es vor, schlicht {name} genannt zu werden. Freut mich, Euch kennenzulernen, äh, Ich-aus-einer-anderen-Version-der-Existenz."
languages.original_text: "Some refer to me as the Warden of the Expanse, but I prefer being addressed simply as {name}. Nice to meet you... ah... me-from-a-different-version-of-existence."

traits.locale_text: "Manche nennen mich {mf|Hüter|Hüterin} der Ausdehnung, doch ich ziehe es vor, schlicht {name} genannt zu werden. Freut mich, Euch kennenzulernen, äh, Ich-aus-einer-anderen-Versin-der-Existenz."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: "Bazıları bana Enginlik'in Dizdarı der ama ben sadece {name} denmesini tercih ediyorum. Tanıştığımıza memnun oldum... Varoluşun farklı bir versiyonundan ben."
languages.original_text: "Some refer to me as the Warden of the Expanse, but I prefer being addressed simply as {name}. Nice to meet you... ah... me-from-a-different-version-of-existence."
